Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of St. Joseph the Carpenter:

Text.Language: Hiten nieu,/ n~te peniwt eyouab n~dikeoc: piy~m/i Iwc/f pihamse: P[oic a~rih~mot nan m~pi,w e~bol n~te nennobi.
Through the prayers of our holy righteous father, Joseph the carpenter O Lord, grant us the forgiveness of our sins.
